p: Hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine are cellular autophagy modulators that interact with enveloped viruses, such as retroviruses, flaviviruses, and coronaviruses, at late stages of replication (Savarino et al. 2003; Byrd and Horwitz 1991). Hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine anti-HIV-1 activity was demonstrated in conjunction with antiretroviral drugs such as zidovudine, hydroxyurea, and didanosine in vitro, or patients (Paton and Aboulhab 2005).
